column5: Located in the heart of downtown Alpine Texas this apartment(part of a four-plex) is the perfect place to scout out the city, explore the surrounding towns of Marfa and Fort Davis, and discover the beauty of Big Bend National Park.Formerly a hospital built in the 1920's, you are walking distance to shops, restaurants,bars in historic downtown and on Murphy street. Half a block from Amtrak, too!!! 1 bedroom/1 bath, living/kitchen, washer/dryer! Queen bed&queen sleeper sofa.Enjoy the Backyard!
